pokemons.name: Aron
pokemons.description: It eats iron ore - and sometimes railroad tracks - to build up the steel armor that protects its body.

pokemons.name: Bulbasaur
pokemons.description: There is a plant seed on its back right from the day this Pokémon is born. The seed slowly grows larger.

pokemons.name: Butterfree
pokemons.description: In battle, it flaps its wings at great speed to release highly toxic dust into the air.

pokemons.name: Charmander
pokemons.description: It has a preference for hot things. When it rains, steam is said to spout from the tip of its tail.

pokemons.name: Ditto
pokemons.description: It can reconstitute its entire cellular structure to change into what it sees, but it returns to normal when it relaxes.

pokemons.name: Gastly
pokemons.description: Born from gases, anyone would faint if engulfed by its gaseous body, which contains poison.

pokemons.name: Mew
pokemons.description: When viewed through a microscope, this Pokémon's short, fine, delicate hair can be seen.

pokemons.name: Pikachu
pokemons.description: Pikachu that can generate powerful electricity have cheek sacs that are extra soft and super stretchy.

pokemons.name: Squirtle
pokemons.description: When it retracts its long neck into its shell, it squirts out water with vigorous force.
